chapter.text: Rahimana (da'i'avana) ne
Kura'ana di sikhi'a diti
Usa ne manukha nu paida kita
Usa nu bolana sikha'i'a
Suraja ate cada de la'i ika hisasa hai
Ate tare te darakhata sijada karade hana
Ate usa ne akasa nu uci'am kita ate takari rakha diti
Ki tusim tolana vica pharaka na karo
Ate inasafa de nala thika tolo ate tola vica garabari na karom
ate usa ne dharati nu khalakata la'i rakha dita
Isa vica meve hana ate khajuram hana, jinham upara khola (galapha) huda hai
Ate turi vala anaja vi ate sugadhi vale phula vi
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
Usa ne manukha nu thikari varagi suki miti tom paida kita
Ate usa ne jinam nu aga di'am lapatam tom paida kita
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
Ate uha malaka hai dovam puraba (carhadi'am) ate dovam pachama (lahidi'am) da
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
Usa ne barabara mila ke calana vale do dari'a (samudara) paida kite
dovam de vica ika parada (roka) hai, jisa tom uha age nahim vadhade
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karonge
Inham dovam (samudaram) vicom moti ate muge nikalade hana
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
Ate jahaza vi use de hana jihare samudara vica paharam vanga kharhe hude hana
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
Jihara dharati'te hai uha nasa hona vala hai
Ate tere raba di hi prasasa vali ate izata vali hasati ka'ima rahegi
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karonge
Use tom magade hana jihare (makhaluka) akasam ate dharati vica hana. Hara roza usa da ika kama
(hai. 30) Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
He do bhari kafali'o! Asim jaladi hi tuhade vala dhi'ana karana vale ham
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
He jinam ate manukham de toli'o! Jekara tuhade tom ho sake tam tusim akasam ate dharati di'am hadam tom nikala ja'u. Tam nikala ja'u tusim' pramana tom binham nahim nikala sakade
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
Tuhade te aga di'am lapatam ate dhu'am chadi'a javega tam tusim baca nahim kara sakauge
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
Phira jadom akasa phata ke camare di' tar'ham lala ho javega
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
So usa dina kise manukha jam jina tom usa de papam bare paratala nahim hovegi
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
Aparadhi apane lachanam tom pachana la'e janage. Phira sira de valam ate pairam tom pharhe janage
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
Iha naraka hai jisa nu aparadhi loka jhutha dasade si
Phira phiranage usa (naraka) de vicakara ate khaul'hade ho'e pani de vicakara
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
Ate jihara bada apane raba de sahamane kharha hona tom dari'a usa la'i do baga hana
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
Dovem bahuta sakhavam vale
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karauge
Dovam vica do casame, vagade hana
tam phira tusim apane prabhu de kihare bhavikha nu nakaroge
dovam bagam vica hareka fala di'am do kisamam (honagi'am)
phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karauge
Uha sar'hana laga ke ajihe baî€¼isatari'am de ute baithe honage, jinham de asatara mote resama de honage ate unham bagam vica phala jhuki'a hovega
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karonge
Unham vica ninvi'am akham vali'am auratam honagi'am. Jinham na unham lokam tom pahilam na kise manukha ne d'uhi'a hovega ate na kise jina ne
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
Uha ajihi'am honagi'am jivem, yakuta (lala) ate marajana (muga) hana
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
Neki da badala neki tom siva'e hora ki hai
phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
Ate inham bagam tom ilava do baga hora hana
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
Dovem gahire gure hare raga de
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
Unham vica do ubalade ho'e jharane honage
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karonge
Unham vica phala khajura ate anara honage
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karonge
Unham vica khubasurata ate cage caritara vali'am auratam honagi'am
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karonge
Huram (savaraga di'am sudari'am) khemi'am vica rahina vali'am
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karauge
Unham tom pahilam na kise manukha ne hatha laga'i'a hovega ate na kise jina ne
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karauge
Hare galici'am ate kimati bisatari'am te sar'hane la ke baithe honage
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karonge
Vadi barakata vala, prasasa vala ate uci sana vala hai tere raba da nam
